incidents.description: Student fell on playground equipment and scraped knee. Applied first aid and monitored. No further medical attention needed.

witnesses.name: Teacher Smith
witnesses.statement: I saw the student slip on the wet surface

incidents.description: Student complained of headache and mild fever. Temperature taken: 99.8Â°F. Parent contacted and student sent home.
Student experienced mild allergic reaction after lunch. Benadryl administered per action plan. Symptoms resolved within 30 minutes. Parent notified.

witnesses.name: Cafeteria Staff
witnesses.statement: Student mentioned feeling itchy after eating
